Header.paragraph: EcoVision is an innovative platform designed to promote sustainability by integrating food redistribution, Green Score assessment, and climate change awareness.

About.paragraph: EcoVision is an innovative platform designed to promote sustainability by integrating food redistribution, Green Score assessment, and climate change awareness. Built using cutting-edge technologies like AI-powered verification, geolocation-based food matching, and gamification, EcoVision empowers individuals and businesses to contribute to a greener planet. Our mission is to bridge the gap between food wastage and hunger while encouraging sustainable practices through an engaging and rewarding system.
